subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Wrigley Field was rocking in anticipation of a Cubs victory yesterday. Then Andre Ethier tuned out the noise, silenced the crowd and sent the Los Angeles Dodgers to a stunning victory.
snippet: Wrigley Field was rocking in anticipation of a Cubs victory yesterday. Then Andre Ethier tuned out the noise, silenced the crowd and sent the Los Angeles Dodgers to a stunning victory.
